body: Thanks for the report and bisection! Working on the fix.

issue.title: Fix crash when looking up tree metadata while prefetching the output of an action template expansion.

labels.name: team-Remote-Exec
labels.description: Issues and PRs for the Execution (Remote) team

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
An action resulting from an action template expansion produces only one of the files in a tree artifact. If, in addition, the file is an in-memory output but its download was requested by the --remote_download_* flags, it will be prefetched when finalizing the action, at which point the prefetcher will look at the metadata for the full tree to determine whether the file should be materialized as a symlink into a different location. This results in a crash because the full tree metadata isn't yet available.

As a fix, the prefetcher now tolerates the absence of tree metadata when these conditions apply. This is still correct because an action template expansion will never materialize its outputs as symlinks.

Fixes #19988.

issue.title: [7.0.0] Fix crash when looking up tree metadata while prefetching the output of an action template expansion.

labels.name: team-Remote-Exec
labels.description: Issues and PRs for the Execution (Remote) team

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
An action resulting from an action template expansion produces only one of the files in a tree artifact. If, in addition, the file is an in-memory output but its download was requested by the --remote_download_* flags, it will be prefetched when finalizing the action, at which point the prefetcher will look at the metadata for the full tree to determine whether the file should be materialized as a symlink into a different location. This results in a crash because the full tree metadata isn't yet available.

As a fix, the prefetcher now tolerates the absence of tree metadata when these conditions apply. This is still correct because an action template expansion will never materialize its outputs as symlinks.

Fixes #19988.

Closes #20001.

Commit https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/8305a2c506e77f13a7f5110710d4d1b0a1c50884

PiperOrigin-RevId: 578176873
Change-Id: I64f765ca5f8852d86150ad866a5fc5930092d661

body: A fix for this issue has been included in[Bazel 7.0.0 RC5](https://releases.bazel.build/7.0.0/rc5/index.html). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible. Thanks!

> A fix for this issue has been included in[Bazel 7.0.0 RC5](https://releases.bazel.build/7.0.0/rc5/index.html). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible. Thanks!

Confirmed resolution using RC5. Thanks!
